full_text: Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available. Thank you, [b](6); (b)(7)(C)[/b] Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-[b](b)(6); (b)(7)(C)[/b] f. (646)836-7665 Page 1004 DOJ-OGR-00023584
